Reviews.Content: stayed sheraton jumeirah 4 nights march 2010 selected property stayed neighborhood previously regrettably recommend property date wise interior bit tired service hit miss primarily miss undoubtedly nicer properties beach usual ugly location water strip countless restaurants collection shops water plan spend time beach spot list beach facilities regrettably facilities looked nice chairs private beach sane lawn surrounded leafy palm trees guests choice sun shade outdoor cafe stopped drink night staff slow setting nice arrived 0030 normal dubai ready excuse acceptable ready hour waited 45 minutes shown positive note front desk manager apologized offered complimentary drink bar ok bit dated entire property beds slept comfortable kept clean staff bathroom fine space wise seen days include nice desk fitness center outdated equipment fills space nice amount selection weights machines elliptical machines actually converted bicycle machines settings simply management team spent time investing ugly checkout minibar night prior diet coke employee called colleague check ensure honest happening gentleman checking beside 10 minutes waiting soda costs 15 bill 100 times amount left poor taste mouth completed book reflected checkin episodes returning expensive wifi service spotty dont accept properties charge wifi butif property charge acceptable service thumbs sheraton breakfast experience morning morning ate breakfast 0700 selecting buffet learned chef omelets breakfast begins 0630 advertise chef person substitute buffet ok special breakfast learned afternoon meetings colleague lunch stopped lobby restaurant mistake pastrami sandwich understand am dubai expectations sheraton sandwich chance wrong kidding sandwich single slice pastrami couldnt believe check hostess fine explained smiled proceeded hey sheraton training employees questions train handle answers

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely worth staying”
Reviews.Author: norttim
Reviews.Content: stay absolutely unlike written experience staff friendly polite finland service perfect especially staff restaurants beach bar moods azure etc amazing true building little bother cleanliness friendly staff gonna book hotel time bad hotel prices expensive eat quests wouldnt eat outside prices reasonable

Reviews.Title: “lovely staff, nice atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: JoHovean
Reviews.Content: stayed february trip emirates didnt expect akin canary wharf summer beyond skyscrapers chain stores shopping centres youll mix cultures alongside pretty weather february tolerable kids play beach fear sizzling 15 mins milky white people fear burning staff hotel helpful friendly id recommend spend lazy days beach stroll lunch time loads inexpensive restaurants doorstep maybe wander little city evenings downsides distance city centre cabs absolutely clean tidy updating attract return customers

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton was a pleasent stay”
Reviews.Author: boston06
Reviews.Content: read negative reviews concerned arrival untill left left wondering people stayed found superb service food excellent beach plenty sunbeds location people suited recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Avoid it while you can”
Reviews.Author: asialoverR
Reviews.Content: hotel location dining outing pretty torn furniture agree previous reviews reception staff unfriendly namely mustafa lack smile attitude courtesy ahmed evening shift little stay starwood hotels dubai worl wide reception staff horrible suggest management asian staff front liners smile polite ok office price paid stayed sofitel hilton meters check add evian water bill insisting consumed upstairs beside tv couldnt argue admit staying mistake stay
